name: Draco Containment
description:
In order to prevent a dragon from terrorizing your village, you decided to try to keep him in one spot by consistently feeding him. Collect the fruit in your cage and send it towards the dragon before he gets too angry. Get upgrades after each day to help keep him at bay.

Controls

A & D - Move
LMB - Dash
RMB - Open Cage

Tips

- You can open the cage and then dash right to launch fruits towards the dragon
- Dropping fruits onto the conveyor belt makes them slowly move until they get to the dragon
